products.name: șuncă Praga
products.facts: ["Made from high-quality pork sourced from sustainable farms.","Produced using traditional curing methods that minimize environmental impact.","Contains no artificial preservatives or additives, ensuring natural flavor.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce waste and promote recycling."]

products.name: Tartare sauce
products.facts: ["Tartare sauce is traditionally made from mayonnaise, chopped pickles, capers, and herbs.","It is commonly served as a condiment for seafood dishes, particularly fried fish.","The sauce originated in France and is named after the Tartars, who were believed to have eaten raw meat with a similar sauce.","Tartare sauce can be customized with additional ingredients like lemon juice, onions, or dill for added flavor."]

products.name: Penne, Brown Rice
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Pastas, Penne, Penne rigate
products.labels: Organic, No GMOs, Non GMO project, en:no-gluten
products.facts: ["Penne, Brown Rice is made from whole grain brown rice, providing a gluten-free alternative to traditional pasta.","Brown rice is a more sustainable crop compared to white rice, as it requires less processing and retains more nutrients.","The ecological footprint of brown rice is lower than that of many other grains, due to its ability to grow in diverse environments and require less water.","Quality brown rice pasta, like Penne, is rich in fiber and essential nutrients, making it a healthier option for consumers."]

products.name: Boom Chicka Pop Sweet & Salty Kettle Corn
products.labels: Vegetarian, Kosher, No gluten, No GMOs, Vegan, DZG Gluten free, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Made with non-GMO ingredients","Gluten-free and contains no artificial flavors or preservatives","Popcorn is popped in sunflower oil for a healthier option","The packaging is recyclable, promoting eco-friendly practices"]

products.name: Chocolate 2% Reduced Fat
products.categories: Beverages and beverages preparations, Beverages, Dairies, Dairy drinks, Milks, Flavoured milks, Chocolate milks, Chocolate reduced milk
products.facts: ["Made from reduced fat milk, cocoa, and sugar.","Contains no artificial flavors or preservatives.","Packaging is often recyclable, promoting eco-friendly practices.","Rich in calcium and vitamins, contributing to nutritional quality."]

products.name: Honey bunches of oat
products.brands: Honey Bunches Of Oats,Post Foods  Llc
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, Honey cereal balls
products.facts: ["Honey Bunches of Oats contains whole grain oats as a primary ingredient.","The cereal is made with real honey for natural sweetness.","The packaging is recyclable, promoting eco-friendly practices.","It is fortified with vitamins and minerals to enhance nutritional quality."]

products.name: Mosterd, coarsely ground
products.facts: ["Mosterd, coarsely ground is typically made from mustard seeds, vinegar, and various spices.","The production of mustard seeds requires less water compared to other crops, making it a more sustainable option.","Coarsely ground mustard retains more of the seed's natural oils, contributing to a richer flavor and aroma.","High-quality coarsely ground mustard is often made from organic seeds, ensuring minimal pesticide use and better environmental impact."]

products.name: Old Fashioned Oats
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Seeds, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, Cereal grains, Flakes, Cereal flakes, Rolled flakes, Rolled oats, Oat, Avena
products.labels: No gluten, No artificial flavors, No GMOs, No preservatives, No added sugar, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Old Fashioned Oats are made from whole oat groats that are steamed and then rolled to flatten them.","They are a whole grain food, rich in dietary fiber and essential nutrients, promoting heart health and digestion.","The production of oats typically has a lower environmental impact compared to other grains, requiring less water and fertilizers.","Old Fashioned Oats are minimally processed, preserving their natural quality and flavor, making them a wholesome choice for breakfast."]

products.name: Organic Pure Maple Syrup
products.facts: ["Made from 100% pure maple sap harvested from maple trees.","Organic certification ensures no synthetic pesticides or fertilizers are used in production.","Sustainably sourced, supporting local ecosystems and reducing carbon footprint.","Rich in antioxidants and minerals, offering a natural alternative to refined sugars."]

products.name: Nutella & Go! with Breadsticks
products.categories: Snacks, Breakfasts, Spreads, Sweet snacks, Sweet spreads, Biscuits and cakes, fr:Pâtes à tartiner, Hazelnut spreads, Chocolate spreads, Cocoa and hazelnuts spreads
products.facts: ["Nutella & Go! features a combination of creamy Nutella hazelnut spread and crunchy breadsticks.","The packaging is designed for convenience, making it easy to enjoy on-the-go.","Nutella is made with high-quality ingredients, including roasted hazelnuts, cocoa, and milk.","The product is often packaged in a way that minimizes waste, promoting eco-friendly practices."]
